about_the_game:
Dewdrop Dynasty is a charming neo-retro Metroidvania that includes cheese mines, power struggles, mecha crabs, and of course lots and lots of combat. And unlike most games in the genre, it features a light-hearted setting filled with strange and wonderful characters. But don't be fooled. There's a much more sinister secret abrew in the world of Underland.

Abilities & Upgrades!

Become stronger and explore deeper with new abilities and weapons.

Exploration!

Navigate your way throughout the interconnecting regions of Underland.

Weird Characters!

Meet a hilarious cast of characters, each with their own unique personalities and quirks.

Drama!

Unlike some Metroidvanias in the genre, Dewdrop Dynasty has a strong focus on dramatic story telling mixed with challenging boss fights.

Boss Battles!

Go head-to-head in intense boss battles, all while unlocking the mysteries behind the alluring Dewdrops.




Dewdrop Dynasty is a fast, charming Metroidvania, but it's not for everyone. In order to know if Dewdrop Dynasty is the right game for you, see if you love any of the points down below. (We wont be offended if you don't)

How Many Of these Points Do You Like?


  • Platforming
  • Unlocking Abilities
  • A Short But Charming Game
  • Puzzle Solving
  • Complaining Miniature Mice
  • Nonlinear story Telling
  • Saturday Morning Styled Villains
  • Gun-based Combat
  • Exploration
  • Funny Characters
  • Light Hearted tone
